data.content: Le 5 octobre, nous soulignerons le 40e anniversaire du premier Canadien dans l'espace. 40 ans. 4 dcennies. 4 campagnes de recrutement dastronautes. Retour sur ce grand pan de notre histoire : https://t.co/c8i1BNxjt0 https://t.co/82MOboHqow

On October 5, we will celebrate the 40th anniversary of the first Canadian in space. 40 years. 4 decades. 4 astronaut recruitment campaigns. Take a look back: https://t.co/fhLTiKSXk6 https://t.co/X5eXIgdGZR

data.content: It took @bepicolombo just 30 minutes to map Mercurys magnetic landscape as it sped past the planet during its #MercuryFlyby in 2023: a tantalising taste of what the mission will investigate when it arrives in orbit around the Solar Systems innermost planet. https://t.co/g9dlueBPXg

This week the Canadian Human Space Flight Program turns 40! Our "Space Eh!" playlist is perfect to get you in the mood to learn more about the human space missions our astronauts have participated in. Check it out:
https://t.co/fk10otGPxh https://t.co/Oa4SQFAoKc
2024 marks 40 years of Canadian astronauts in space!  Heres a timeline of the past four decades: https://t.co/acoKtzdJFg
LIVE: Our @SpaceX #Crew9 mission launches to the @Space_Station. Liftoff from Cape Canaveral Space Force Station is scheduled for 1:17pm ET (1717 UTC). Questions? Use #AskNASA https://t.co/ShUyD36syY

Ground control to the cosmos, we've got a big day ahead. Not just a regular birthday wish, but a cosmic birthday wish! Happiest of birthday to @nasa & @jaxa_en. 

Cheers to an out-of-this world partnership, lets continue working and exploring together.  https://t.co/sodAiFDSoo

In nearly 70 years of spaceflight, around 10 000 satellites and rocket parts have reentered Earth's atmosphere. Yet for such an event, we still lack a clear view on what actually happens to a satellite during its fiery last moments. https://t.co/1YHfYpxvAY

Our @EuropaClipper spacecraft is sending scienceand poetryto Jupiter's unique moon.

Hear from Ada Limn, U.S. Poet Laureate, and planetary scientist Lynnae Quick Henderson in the latest episode of our Curious Universe podcast: https://t.co/Sd6njwPy9z https://t.co/3LmTyNTRT0
